metadata.inclusion:
1. Touch keypad with palm
2. Enter User code in Normal Mode only. Enter Master code if operating Master Mode.
3. Press 'I' button for Registration from inside the battery cover
4. Press 9,#,1,# on the keypad in sequence
5. Press 'I' button after 'Ding dong dang' melody plays
metadata.exclusion:
1. Touch keypad with palm
2. Enter User code in Normal Mode only. Enter Master code if operating Master Mode.
3. Press 'I' button for Registration from inside the battery cover
4. Press 9,#,3,# on the keypad in sequence
5. Press 'I' button after 'Ding dong dang' melody plays
metadata.reset:
1. Touch keypad with palm
2. Enter User code in Normal Mode only. Enter Master code if operating Master Mode.
3. Press 'I' button for Registration from inside the battery cover
4. Press 9,#,9,# on the keypad in sequence
5. Press 'I' button after 'Ding dong dang' melody plays
